name: Super Saucer
description:
Defend humanity from the alien horde in this retro styled arcade space shooter. Features
  • Use ships to suit all play styles.
  • Customise your ship and weapons.
  • Upgrade your ship to become more powerful.
  • Drone assistance available - customisable and upgradeable.
  • Win in game prizes as you progress through the levels.
  • Win unique alien enhanced weapons and modifications.
  • Replay any completed level to build cash for upgrades.
Controls
  • Keyboard or controller compatible - Fully customisable controls.
  • Xbox 360 controller with a Chrome browser gives good results.
Support
  • Visit our support site to post a support request.
